website_summaries.verdict: Many overnight guests prefer the generous dimensions of a queen size mattress, and this airbed provides a plush, comfortable foundation and an adjustable dial for firmness.
pros: 18-inch raised height is easy to mount and dismount
Dial control for customized firmness level
Queen size for larger sleepers or couples
High-strength polyester fibers make this extra durable
cons: Some reports of air leakage over time
A few customer complaints about comfort level

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up, threw it away today after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is very disappointing. It has "sharp" seams all around the sides, which allow tears to easily occur and also make it damn near impossible to patch the leaks once they form. The mattress offered decent comfort for a few months with a memory foam topper (IMO a necessity on all air mattresses), but my family's Aerobed has served them admirably for years without developing any leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfortness
customer_reviews.text: Just got this airbed today.It took a minute to inflate and I just spread my comforter on it.It has great comfort and worth the money guys.It huge and can accommodate up to two people on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: aneesh k.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to inflated and deflate and come with storage bag . But this air bed need to refill every next day. Otherwise so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great Airbed! Holds air and does not deflate within a couple of hours. The seller shipped it fast and not over packaged. I would purchase this item again if I ever need too and I would do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: I Would not recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this bed 5 stars but I can’t I bought this sept 17th I only use it on the weekends Saturday and sundays and it does not hold the air in it always leaks. I fill it up right before I go to bed nice and firm but within few hours a lot of air is out . There are two adults that sleep on this and every time it leaks. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Great value queen-sized mattress! Very stable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, competes very well with the high-end stuff available! Lasted 6 months before blowing seams. Bought another and it seems to be even better than the first. Slower to inflate than the high-dollar mattresses that I've been using for the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Undergoose

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bed is very nice and comfortable, easy to blow up with built in pump. 16 year old Grandson loved it. Good price, quick delivery, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold in air
customer_reviews.text: This Mattress seemed great at the begging, but it doesn't hold in hair. It inflates by being plugged into the wall, has a knob that you turn to the left to deflate and right to inflate. but this knob doesn't have a setting to lock the mattress, and therefore keeping the air in. We've used it a few times, trying to leave the knob at different settings and it continues to deflate. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stark the Dane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use/Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is very easy to set up. It is simple to inflate/deflate, and does so in just a few minutes. The built-in pump makes the entire process convenient, without fumbling around with a lot of parts or steps. Have used it several times, and it has held the air very well. Comfortable and easy to inflate to just the right pressure for individual comfort levels.
customer_reviews.author: RowingRef

customer_reviews.title: Very nice seems good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seems good quality. have had it a few months but only got to use it last night. Easy to inflate & deflate...Great for a senior like me. My guest was very comfortable- & my 2 pups loved it too Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term. Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate. Not really comfortable. You really need to get a mattress pad or something. Height was great while it lasted. It was all good for a few months of use but then I heard a pop and a small hole appeared, so it doesn’t last long. I wouldn’t spend a lot on these beds because you’ll most likely get a few months use out of them all together and just buying a new one is easier than dealing with spending a lot on something that only has a 90-day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Love the built in pump. Easy to put away too.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best air mattress ever! Easy and fast to inflate and deflate. Firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Brandel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed to use for overnight stays at!!!! my work, I am very pleased with my purchase. A GOOD BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rauchle

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress for your bed you can afford
customer_reviews.text: Due to back pain, I started sleeping on an air mattress years. This mattress is not for camping. It is made to look and act like a traditional mattress. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, put air in and used for 5 days without having to add any air.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it wasn't going to hold air but after I read the instructions you have tio fill it up a few times the first few uses Anna then you will have no problem
customer_reviews.author: Not the Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this mattress on sale, which was a good reason to buy it compared to other mattresses, but am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MARK D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & slept great
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. Easy to inflate & deflate. Folds up easily. Used this during our move, packed the mattresses, slept on the air mattress & slept great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is a good height and has been worth the money. I have to re-inflate every couple of days, but it's easy with the electric pump.
customer_reviews.author: HAJ

customer_reviews.title: So sad! I loved it until it popped.
customer_reviews.text: I am rather disappointed. Only had the mattress for a month and it literally busted at the seem of the bed the other day when I went to inflate it. Was hoping to get more use of this but otherwise it was extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It's just as advertised. I only tried it for less than a month so I don't know how long lasting it it but for now I'm well satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these air matresses........way comfortable and easy to inflate......just plug it in.......ready to sleep in minutes
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I use it as a “real mattress” and although it loses some pressure every once in a while it’s the best air mattress I’ve ever had/slept on.
customer_reviews.author: AHall

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it......
customer_reviews.text: I just spent the 2 most miserable nights of my life camping. It inflates beautifully, but did not hold air. BRAND NEW OUT OF THE PACKAGE. :( NOT a happy camper.........
customer_reviews.author: Mickey P

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is my second night sleeping on the bed. And as I was scorlljng through my phone I heard a pop. The bed is deflating as we speak. I weigh about 210 pounds. This bed was expensive and very poor quality of I cant even get 2 full nights sleep on it. Go spend your $80 on a better bed
customer_reviews.author: Guyo

customer_reviews.title: Very nic3
customer_reviews.text: Love it however we tend to roll towards the sides at night and have almost fallen out. Holds up well to repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer v.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, need to test it out a bit longer. The built in pump is convenient and it being raised is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Quite Thick and comfy
customer_reviews.text: need to inflate extra after first use. stayed inflated for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: An excellent find!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air mattress! It is the closest thing I have slept on that compares to an actual bed! And the price was excellent! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: nina simone

customer_reviews.title: Not so great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, while it keeps air it’s get punctured very easily. The mattress lasts about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Needed to reinflate a few times over the week just to keep it firm. Over all comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Blows up quickly and my guest were very happy and slept peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: It inflated fast and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for when my grandkids come over and on overnight visits .
customer_reviews.author: Karen White

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd review after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 years I have been using this. This is my 2nd 5 star rating. I slept on it for 4 months strait in the middle of moving and waiting for new bed, also have used for camping and having in guest room for people staying over. Has held up great, does not loose air at all. my cat even climbs all over it and sleeps on it and have had no punctures from her at all. Best air matress by far.
customer_reviews.author: Kat King

customer_reviews.title: and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I researched many other reviews before purchasing this mattress and I have to say, it was time well spent. This mattress is high quality, portable, and easy to inflate!
customer_reviews.author: B76141

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, takes about 2-3 min to inflate and doesn't have any smell to it. Overall I'm very pleased with it. Hopefully it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Anna the explorer

customer_reviews.title: The One to Get
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several air beds over the years - this is absolutely the most impressive. Very comfortable - NO LEAKAGE at all - good to sit on or to lay on - good for two people. Pump gets it ready to use in just a few minutes - and then it will deflate it completely so you can put it back in the bag. Recent guests who used it said it was more comfortable than their sleep number bed!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kinniburgh

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air mattress! Definitely the best I've ever owned! It inflates super easy, and i love that it has a built-in in pump! The mattress is very comfortable, and i have slept so well on it. It's the perfect mattress for guests, and to just have as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: this was the 2nd one i purchased and did so because of the service and quality. thank you
customer_reviews.author: pam koehler

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a family member who has been using it as their bed for a while year. No leaks and really comfortable so I hear. That's all a person can ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Ad Elle

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold air on first use
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and my guest was halfway on the floor. It lost so much air in 5 hours' time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So far a great extra bed to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Even holds 250 lbs relatives! and super easy to blow up and store.
customer_reviews.author: William Chester

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my daughter who was visiting from New York. She said it was very comfortable and she slept well. It is made well. I hope it last. So far so good. I didn’t have to put more air in for the week she was here.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Hard!
customer_reviews.text: The isn’t plush at all! Keep looking for a better product folks....
customer_reviews.author: Icon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy blow up bed! I really liked the fact it was high off the ground. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Performance and value
customer_reviews.text: So far, this bed is comfortable and have had no problems with it thus far. I had ones twice as expensive that are not as good. Hope to feel this way in 6 months. Update: After less than a year, it is leaking air, quite a bit and will have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My air bed arrive very quickly and it feels amazing! I love sleeping on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is every bit as sturdy and comfortable as we've come to expect
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th Intex air mattress we've purchased. It is every bit as sturdy and comfortable as we've come to expect. Intex is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepy23

product_meta.title: Intex Queen Ultra Plush Fiber-Tech Airbed Air Mattress Bed with Built-in Pump
product_meta.description: Here's an airbed that is sure to impress your most important guests. The Intex Queen Ultra Plush Fiber-Tech Raised Airbed combines comfort, convenience and great looks into one luxurious airbed. It boasts a unique textured sleeping surface and inflated outer perimeter band for extra stability. The built-in electric pump makes inflating fast and easy and allows you to adjust the firmness with the touch of a button.
feature_bullets: Inflatable Queen plush air bed for a perfect night’s sleep
Built-in AC electric pump will inflate and deflate the airbed with the switch of a button
Engineered with Fiber-Tech Technology, which is comprised of thousands of high-strength polyester fibers that won't stretch over time
Provides enhanced comfort, stability, and support
The 18 inch raised height provides easy access onto and off the bed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
